title: Taric pool party skin
body: Hey riot ive recently found a little visual bug that happens every game i play with taric. When ever i use tarics W with the pool party skin the line that connects to taric and the allies will bug out and shows the line disappearing and reappearing. please fix this when you can

replies.body:
Hey 5STKS - 

Thanks for the report! We have a fix for this ready for 7.13!
